frontMatter.title: Spring Cloud Stream With Kafka
frontMatter.summary: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!

next.title: 2021 / Nested
next.summary: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!
